import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent { isExpanded: boolean = false; constructor(private authService: AuthService) {} // Inject the AuthService toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } closeMenu() { this.isExpanded = false; } isLoggedIn(): boolean { return this.authService.isLoggedIn(); // Implement the isLoggedIn() method in your AuthService } logout() { this.authService.logout(); // Implement the logout() method in your AuthService } }
